title: i can't sine in to my account
body: it is not letting my sine in to my account with the new beta {{champion:245}} and i had to create a new account now i am back to level one

replies.body: hmmm are you able to tangent or cosine into your account?

Can you confirm you're using the right username and password by trying to launch into the Legacy Client using the button at the bottom of the login screen, as shown below?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked!
